Title: Vidocq
Genre: Action, Crime, Fantasy, Mystery, Sci-Fi, Thriller
Actors: Gérard Depardieu, Guillaume Canet, Inés Sastre, André Dussollier
Plot: Paris. 1830. In the heart of the town, Vidocq, a famous detective, disappeared as he fights the Alchemist, an assassin that he has been pursuing for a few months. His young biographer, Etienne Boisset, decides to have revenge on Vidocq's death and takes the investigation on...
